S0174.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 18 YEARS OR LESS 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 YEARS 10. 30-34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. WENT TO COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM? E. SECTION:  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. OUTSIDE U.S. OR OUTSIDE TERRITORIES BELONGING TO U.S. 11. TERRITORIES BELONGING TO U.S. 00. NO ANSWER E. STATE:

S0174.Q5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q6. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM?  1. 1 YEAR OR LESS 2. 1 YEAR TO 2 YEARS 3. 2 YEARS TO 3 YEARS 4. 3 YEARS TO 4 YEARS 5. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q7. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q8. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPAN?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q9. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q10. ON THE WHOLE, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE ARM?  1. I LIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. I RATHER DISLIKE IT 4. I DISLIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q11. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPAN?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q12. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS YOUR OWN MORAL?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q13. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY IS RU?  1. IT IS RUN VERY WELL 2. IT IS RUN PRETTY WELL 3. IT IS NOT RUN SO WELL 4. IT IS RUN VERY POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q14. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION ARE YOU IN AT THE PRESENT TIM?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q15A. DO YOU THINK YOU HAVE AS MUCH OF A PERSONAL STAKE IN THIS WAR AS ANYBODY ELS?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I THINK SO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 15B NOT CODED.

S0174.Q16. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY IS PLAYING IN WINNING THE WA?  1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART 2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART 3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q17. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE GERMANS AFTER THE WA?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY GERMAN 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE GERMAN NATION 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q18. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE JAPANESE AFTER THE WA?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY JAPANESE 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY JAPANESE PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE JAPANESE NATION 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q19. HOW MANY OF YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS TAKE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN THEIR ME?  1. ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM DO 4. FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q20. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS KNOW WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO D?  1. THEY HAVE A GOOD IDEA OF WHAT I CAN DO 2. THEY HAVE SOME IDEA OF WHAT I CAN DO 3. THEY KNOW LITTLE OR NOTHING ABOUT WHAT I CAN DO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q21. HOW MANY OF THE NON-COMS IN YOUR COMPANY HANDLE THEIR JOBS AS WELL AS ANYONE ELSE THAT COULD BE PICKED FROM YOUR COMPAN?  1. ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. FEW OF THEM 5. NONE OF THEM 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q22. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. VERY DISSATISFIED 4. DISSATISFIED 5. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q23. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q24. DO YOU THINK A SOLDIER WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN YOUR COMPAN?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q25. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO THEIR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q26. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q27. EVERY SOLDIER MUST HAVE A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TRAINING. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHEN WOULD YOU MOST LIKE TO HAVE YOUR TRAININ?  1. SAME AS IT IS NOW 2. FOUR EVENINGS A WEEK, ONE HOUR EACH NIGHT 3. TWO EVENINGS A WEEK, TWO HOURS EACH NIGHT 4. TWO FULL DAYS EVERY MONTH 5. A WHOLE WEEK EVERY THREE MONTHS 6. SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q28. IS THERE ANY KIND OF TRAINING WHICH YOU THINK YOU SHOULD BE GETTING MORE O?  1. YES, WE NEED MORE TRAINING 2. NO, WE GET EVERYTHING WE NEED 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q29. IS THERE ANY KIND OF TRAINING WHICH YOU THINK YOU ARE GETTING TOO MUCH O?  1. YES, WE GET TOO MUCH 2. NO, WE NEED EVERYTHING WE GET 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q30. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A FIGHTING OUTFIT 2. IN A NON-FIGHTING OUTFIT, BUT NEAR THE FRONT 3. IN A NON-FIGHTING OUTFIT HERE 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q31. IF YOU COULD HAVE YOUR CHOICE OF STAYING ON THIS ISLAND OR BEING STATIONED ON SOME OTHER ISLAND IN THE PACIFIC WHICH WOULD YOU CHOOS?  1. I WOULD MOVE TO ANY OTHER ISLAND IN THE PACIFIC JUST TO GET AWAY FROM HERE 2. I WOULD MOVE TO SOME OTHER ISLAND IF I COULD CHOOSE THE ISLAND 3. I WOULD NOT WANT TO MOVE TO ANY OTHER ISLAND IN THE PACIFIC 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q32. HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU BEEN ON SICK CALL IN THE PAST MONT?  1. ONCE 2. TWICE 3. THREE TIMES 4. FOUR TIMES 5. FIVE OR MORE TIMES 6. I HAVEN'T BEEN ON SICK CALL IN THE PAST MONTH 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q33A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE MEDICAL TREATMENT YOU GET IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS PRETTY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS POOR 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 33B NOT CODED.
S0174.Q34. HAVE YOU BEEN IN AN ARMY HOSPITAL SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN OVERSEA?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q35A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE TREATMENT SOLDIERS GET IN OVERSEAS ARMY HOSPITAL?  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS PRETTY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS POOR 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 35B NOT CODED.

S0174.Q36. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN PICKED UP BY M.P'S OR TOWN POLICE SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN OVERSEA?  1. I HAVE BEEN PICKED UP BY M.P'S 2. I HAVE BEEN PICKED UP BY TOWN POLICE 3. I HAVE BEEN PICKED UP BY BOTH M.P'S AND TOWN POLICE 4. I HAVE NEVER BEEN PICKED UP BY EITHER M.P'S OR TOWN POLICE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 37 NOT CODED.

S0174.Q38. DO YOU THINK TOWN POLICE HERE USUALLY TREAT SOLDIERS FAIRLY OR UNFAIRL?  1. TOWN POLICE ARE USUALLY FAIR 2. ABOUT HALF ARE, HALF ARE NOT 3. TOWN POLICE ARE USUALLY NOT FAIR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q39. DO YOU THINK M.P'S HERE USUALLY TREAT SOLDIERS FAIRLY OR UNFAIRL?  1. M.P'S ARE USUALLY FAIR 2. ABOUT HALF ARE, HALF ARE NOT 3. M.P'S ARE USUALLY NOT FAIR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q40. IN YOUR OPINION HOW DOES THE TREATMENT THE NEGRO SOLDIER GETS FROM THE M.P'S COMPARE WITH THE TREATMENT THE WHITE SOLDIER GET?  1. NEGRO SOLDIERS ARE TREATED BETTER THAN WHITE SOLDIERS 2. NEGRO SOLDIERS ARE TREATED ABOUT THE SAME AS WHITE SOLDIERS 3. NEGRO SOLDIERS ARE TREATED WORSE THAN WHITE SOLDIERS 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q41. IN THE LAST 30 DAYS ABOUT HOW MANY TIMES HAVE YOU HAD A PASS FOR 8 HOURS OR MOR?  1. ONCE 2. TWICE 3. THREE TIMES 4. FOUR TIMES 5. FIVE OR MORE TIMES 6. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q42. WHEN YOU HAVE A DAY OFF, DO YOU USUALLY LEAVE THE POS?  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. SELDOM 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q43. ON THE WHOLE, HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH THE NUMBER OF PASSES GIVEN OUT IN YOUR COMPAN?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER
S0174.Q44. HOW OFTEN DO YOU HAVE TROUBLE FINDING INTERESTING THINGS TO DO WHILE YOU ARE ON PAS?  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. SELDOM 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q45A. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN HERE, ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU GO TO A USO CLU?  1. ONCE EVERY TWO OR THREE WEEKS 2. ONCE A WEEK 3. TWO OR MORE TIMES A WEEK 4. ONCE A MONTH OR LESS 5. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 45B NOT CODED.

S0174.Q46A. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH YOUR CHANCES TO GO TO DANCES HER?  1. I AM VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. I AM PRETTY WELL SATISFIED 3. I AM SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. I AM VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 46B NOT CODED.

S0174.Q47. EVERY SOLDIER IN THIS AREA IS SUPPOSED TO BE ABLE TO SWIM 50 YARDS. IF HE CAN'T SWIM 50 YARDS, HE MUST LEARN TO DO SO. HAVE YOU PASSED THE 50 YARD SWIMMING TES?  1. YES, I HAVE PASSED THE TEST 2. NO, I HAVE NOT PASSED THE TEST, BUT EXPECT TO SOON 3. NO, I HAVE NOT PASSED THE TEST AND DO NOT EXPECT TO 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q48A. DO YOU THINK IT IS A GOOD IDEA OR A POOR IDEA TO MAKE EVERY SOLDIER LEARN TO SWIM 50 YARD?  1. IT IS A VERY GOOD IDEA 2. IT IS A PRETTY GOOD IDEA 3. IT IS NOT SUCH A GOOD IDEA 4. IT IS A VERY POOR IDEA 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 48B NOT CODED.

S0174.Q49. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH YOUR CHANCES TO PLAY GAMES AND TAKE PART IN SPORTS IN YOUR CAMP ARE?  1. I AM VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. I AM PRETTY WELL SATISFIED 3. I AM SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. I AM VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q50. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH YOUR CHANCES TO SEE MOVIES IN YOUR CAMP ARE?  1. I AM VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. I AM PRETTY WELL SATISFIED 3. I AM SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. I AM VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q51A. COULD YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS DO MORE THAN THEY ARE DOING TO GIVE YOU INTERESTING AND WORTHWHILE THINGS TO DO IN YOUR OFF-DUTY FREE TIM?  1. THEY DO ALL THEY CAN NOW 2. THEY COULD DO SOMEWHAT MORE 3. THEY COULD DO A LOT MORE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 51B NOT CODED.

S0174.Q52A. IF THE ARMY SET UP CLASSES WHERE YOU COULD STUDY SOME SCHOOL SUBJECT IN YOUR FREE TIME, WOULD YOU GO TO ONE OF THE CLASSE?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I AM NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 52B NOT CODED.

S0174.Q53. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THE TOWN PEOPLE OVER HERE TREAT YOU BETTER OR WORSE THAN THE TOWN PEOPLE DID BACK ON THE MAINLAN?  1. THEY TREAT US BETTER OVER HERE 2. THEY TREAT US ABOUT THE SAME OVER HERE 3. THEY TREAT US WORSE OVER HERE 0. NO ANSWER

S0174.Q54. HOW DO YOU USUALLY FEEL ABOUT THE ARMY FOOD YOU ARE GETTIN?  1. IT IS USUALLY GOOD FOOD AND WELL COOKED 2. IT IS USUALLY GOOD FOOD BUT POORLY COOKED 3. IT IS USUALLY POOR FOOD, BUT WELL COOKED 4. IT IS USUALLY POOR FOOD AND POORLY COOKED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 55, 56 AND 57 NOT CODED.

S0174.V58. COMPANY AND UNIT IDENTIFICATION:  1. FIRST COMPANY BN. A 2. FIRST COMPANY BN. B 3. SECOND COMPANY BN. A 4. SECOND COMPANY BN. B 5. THIRD COMPANY BN. A 6. HEADQUARTERS BN. A AND B 7. SEPARATE COMPANY
S0174.V59. SERIAL NUMBERS WITHIN COMPANY AND UNIT:  ANP X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.
